title: Reflective Instructional Design Through Literary Inquiry and Classroom Experience

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Aims to develop and apply reflective teaching methods that accommodate diverse student interpretations in literature classes, targeting pre-service elementary teachers

learning_goals: Students can explain at least three methods for connecting literary work themes with personal experiences through thematic analysis
Learners can write reflective feedback evaluating their instructional design and suggesting improvement directions through reflective journaling
Develop and implement at least two classroom management strategies that accommodate diverse literary interpretations by students in educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
